docs.text: Compose Resources Gradle plugin ¶ Download from MavenCentral ¶ implementation ( "com.javiersc.compose-resources:gradle-plugin: $ version " ) Usage ¶ plugins { kotlin ( "multiplatform" ) id ( "com.android.library" ) id ( "com.javiersc.compose.resources" ) } kotlin { //... } android { // ... } composeResources { suffixes = listOf ( "blue" , "dark" ) packageName = "com.javiersc.some.custom.package" // required }
